item.title: Current Rising Staff Preview
item.description: This week we got the chance to see an opera in hyper reality. One of the benefits of working in an arts organisation like the Royal Opera House is the chance to occasionally see behind the scenes. On Tuesday last we were given just that opportunity as we were amongst the first to experience the “world’s first opera in hyper reality”. Current, Rising is a 15 minute virtual reality experience that allows groups to enter into an immersive world initally together and through the magic of a VR move through a series of virtual environments that include an M.
